intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: After a professional past in the economic / tourism sector, I embarked on a self-taught course of study in CS until I became a developer, {workingYears} years now, initially focused on the front-end but gradually extending my knowledge also to the back-end and deploy, thanks to the projects undertaken during work experience and personal preference for the business logic of applications. Constantly updated and curious to try and learn new technologies.
